Name: objoid
Description: the oid of the object this security label pertains to

Name: classoid
Description: the oid of the system catalog this object appears in

Name: objsubid
Description: for a security label on a table column, this is the column number (the objoid and classoid refer to the table itself). for all other object types, this column is zero.

Name: objtype
Description: the type of object to which this label applies, as text.

Name: objnamespace
Description: the oid of the namespace for this object, if applicable; otherwise null.

Name: objname
Description: the name of the object to which this label applies, as text.

Name: provider
Description: the label provider associated with this label.

Name: label
Description: the security label applied to this object.
